We may collect different types of information during your interactions with our Sites and through our advertising and media across the Internet and mobile apps. We may use third party service providers and/or third-party software to record voice or text chat to help address customer service inquiries. Information from others; inviting friends. Information from other sources. Information you provide through public forums. Event Information.
